project1.title: SWGOH Squad Builder
project1.subtitle: NSS Front-End Capstone
project1.description: A squad planning and management app for the mobile game Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes, built with React and utilizing Firebase for database CRUD implementation.

project2.title: SWGOH Counters List
project2.subtitle: Mobile game companion app built wtih React.js
project2.description: A companion app for the mobile game Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes, which provides PvP team counters using React.js as a front-end framework and Google Sheets as a back-end.

project3.title: Catch of the Day
project3.subtitle: Seafood app build with React.js
project3.description: A seafood store app where a user can add, edit, and delete orders from a seafood restaurant.

project4.title: Cashew Outside
project4.subtitle: Group Project using Firebase for CRUD
project4.description: A dashboard that a user can use to keep track of news articles, messages, events, and a diary.

project5.title: Arnold Flix
project5.subtitle: Movie app using Firebase for CRUD
project5.description:
A page that allows users to keep track of all of their favorite Arnold Schwarzenegger movies.

Features include adding, editing, deleting, rating, and adding to a Watchlist.

project6.title: Fling's Landing
project6.subtitle: Group messaging app project
project6.description: A Game of Thrones themed messaging app.
